string.text: Dude where's my gear?
Max percentage of money that can be lost.
This dictates the max pecentage of money that will be removed from your balance
Max percentage of money that can be dropped.
Max percentage of money that will be added to the drop backpack from the lost money.
Enable condition lose of eqquiped gear
Max condition to lose on all equiped items
Max condition to lose on all equiped items upon death. Cannot be equals or lower than Min Condition
Min condition to lose on all equiped items
Min condition to lose on all equiped items upon death. Cannot be equals or greater than Max Condition
Chance of keeping ammo for the equipped weapons
Chance of keeping equipped weapons
Chance of keeping equipped outfit and headgear
Chance of respawning with full health
Chance of not have any hunger after death
Chance for meals while you are recovering
Chance of losing items forever when dying
Enable the skip of time after death
Always wake up at daytime after death
Enable saving at campfires
